## Notes

-  i should use .by more often instead of group_by...! 
-  much more concise than group_by mutate/summarise ungroup if you only want to do a single action 
 




## Example

```{r}
judges100_appts |> 
# make a unique judge-appointment ID based on judge_id + row_number 
  mutate(judge_appt_id = paste(judge_id, row_number(), sep="_"), .by = judge_id) |> 
  arrange(judge_appt_id) |> 
  relocate(judge_appt_id) 

```
